titleStmt.title: The trayne souldier A sermon preached before the worthy societie of the captaynes and gentle men that exercise armes in the artillery garden. At Saint Andrew-vndershaft in London. Aprill 20. 1619. By I. Leech.
titleStmt.author: Leech, Jeremy, d. 1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by J. B[eale] for Nathanaell Newbery, and are to be sold at the signe of the Starre vnder Saint Peters Church in Corne-hill, and in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The traine souldier.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Starre vnder Saint Peters Church in Corne-hill
